articles.title: South African scientists to discuss Pfizer vaccine study - Reuters
articles.description: Scientists will meet on Thursday to advise South Africa's government on its next steps after a study suggested the dominant local coronavirus variant may reduce protective antibodies from Pfizer's COVID-19 vaccine by two-thirds.
articles.content: JOHANNESBURG (Reuters) - Scientists will meet on Thursday to advise South Africas government on its next steps after a study suggested the dominant local coronavirus variant may reduce protective ant… [+4234 chars]
